languages.text: {n}На мостике повисает минутное молчание. Наконец, вокс вновь осторожно оживает:{/n} "Вас поняла, Лорд-капитан. Все силы будут направлены на спасение ваших сокровищниц и сохранение культурного наследия династии".

{n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."
languages.original_text: {n}На мостике повисает минутное молчание. Наконец, вокс вновь осторожно оживает:{/n} "Вас поняла, Лорд-капитан. Все силы будут направлены на спасение ваших сокровищниц и сохранение культурного наследия династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, the vox coughs:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."
{n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, the vox coughs:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."
{n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, the vox sputters:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."
{n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, the vox sputters:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

{n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

{n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

languages.text: {n}Un silencio momentáneo llena el puente. Después, el voco amplificador transmite una respuesta cautelosa:{/n} «Recibido, Lord Capitán. Haremos todo lo posible por salvar sus tesoros y preservar el legado cultural de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: {n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silencio momentáneo llena el puente. Después, el voco amplificador transmite una respuesta cautelosa:{/n} «Recibido, Lord Capitán. Haremos todo lo posible por salvar sus tesoros y preservar el legado cultural de la dinastía».

languages.text: {n}一瞬、ブリッジが静寂に包まれる。ようやく、音声通信送受信装置から落ち着き払った反応が返ってきた。{/n}「了解しました、ロード・キャプテン。あらゆる努力をして、あなたの財宝、そして王朝の文化遺産を守ります」
languages.original_text: {n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、ブリッジが静寂に包まれる。ようやく、音声通信送受信装置から落ち着き払った反応が返ってきた。{/n}「了解しました、ロード・キャプテン。あらゆる努力をして、あなたの財宝、そして王朝の文化遺産を守ります」

languages.text: {n}舰桥一时陷入了寂静。到最后，通讯器里终于传来了谨慎的答复。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人。我们会尽一切努力挽救您的宝藏，保护王朝的文化遗产。”
languages.original_text: {n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥一时陷入了寂静。到最后，通讯器里终于传来了谨慎的答复。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人。我们会尽一切努力挽救您的宝藏，保护王朝的文化遗产。”

languages.text: {n}Auf der Brücke herrscht kurz Schweigen. Schließlich ertönt eine vorsichtige Antwort aus dem Vox-Transmitter:{/n} "Verstanden, Lord Captain. Wir werden alles unternehmen, um Eure Schätze zu retten und das kulturelle Vermächtnis der Dynastie zu bewahren."
languages.original_text: {n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf der Brücke herrscht kurz Schweigen. Schließlich ertönt eine vorsichtige Antwort aus dem Vox-Transmitter:{/n} "Verstanden, Lord Captain. Wir werden alles unternehmen, um Eure Schätze zu retten und das kulturelle Vermächtnis der Dynastie zu bewahren."

languages.text: {n}La passerelle reste un instant plongée dans le silence. Après un moment, l'émetteur vox transmet une voix circonspecte :{/n} « Bien reçu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Tout sera mis en œuvre pour sauver vos objets précieux et préserver l'héritage culturel de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: {n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}La passerelle reste un instant plongée dans le silence. Après un moment, l'émetteur vox transmet une voix circonspecte :{/n} « Bien reçu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Tout sera mis en œuvre pour sauver vos objets précieux et préserver l'héritage culturel de la dynastie. »

languages.text: {n}Köprü bir anda sessizliğe gömülüyor. Nihayetinde voksyayardan temkinli bir yanıt geliyor.{/n} "Anlaşıldı Lord Kaptan. Hazinelerinizi kurtarmak ve hanedanlığın kültürel mirasını korumak için hiçbir çabadan kaçınılmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}A moment's silence fills the bridge. Finally, a cautious response comes from the vox-caster:{/n} "Copy that, Lord Captain. Every effort will be made to save your treasures and preserve the cultural heritage of the dynasty."
